item.title: The FDA will lift warnings on hormone therapy for menopause
item.description: Hormone therapy drugs have carried box warning labels for years. The Food and Drug Administration is removing them, saying the risks were overstated.

item.title: People want to avoid ultra-processed foods. But experts struggle to define them

item.title: Doctors find fresh evidence that fruits and veggies can act as powerful medicine
item.description: A spate of "Food Is Medicine" studies point to benefits of prescribing healthy food to people at risk of metabolic and diet-related diseases. A JAMA I...

item.title: What's behind your phone cravings and how movement can replace them
item.description: Breaking your scrolling habit could help you feel calmer, happier, and more energized. NPR's Life Kit explains how to get there.
